message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $100.
Hi Bob, I understand your counteroffer, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
